title: France panorama. [No. 71/45]

description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Fire fighting demonstration. 2. Fight against pollution in Paris with air cleaning towers. 3. 2nd phase of SP3000 oceanic sea saucer for observation and underwater photography. 4. Clock making exhibition from 15th century until 1971 plus factory tour showing techniques and most recently, quartz watches. 5. Paris biennial art show for under 35's. 6. Homage to Picasso who is 90 in his home town and in the Louvre. President Pompidou and his wife open exhibition of some of Picasso's paintings.
